Text:
I loved it:).

I never thought there was a prequel/pilot project for Death Note. It was much the same, and you can clearly see this was a prequel.
Thanks! I never knew there was a pilot project before.. until I find this out of nowhere! Thought that there should be some people interested..

I'm still seeding.
I guess I can keep it up for a while,
because of the bad weather my speed wont be very good.
sorry.
